en: Peppa and her family are going camping.
zh: 佩奇和家人一起去露营。

en: this is the tent I had when I was a little boy!
zh: 这个帐篷是我小时候用过的！

en: Daddy? How are you going to make that into a tent?
zh: 爸爸？你要怎么把它搭成帐篷？

en: Mummy Pig, put the tent on the poles, please.
zh: 猪妈妈，请把帐篷布铺到柱子上。

en: The pegs hold the tent up.
The tent is a bit little.
It was big enough for me when I was a boy.
zh: 当我还是个小男孩时它是够用的。

en: But it does look a bit small now...
zh: 但是现在它看起来确实有点小了。。。

en: That's because you've grown a bit since you were a boy, Daddy Pig!
zh: 这是因为你从一个小男孩长大了，猪爸爸！

en: And your tummy has grown the most of all!
zh: 而且你的肚子是长得最大的！

en: Talking of tummies, we should cook supper!
zh: 说起肚子，我们应该煮晚饭了！

en: First, we have to collect sticks to make a fire.
zh: 首先，我们必须先找些木柴来生火。

en: Peppa and George are helping Daddy Pig collect sticks for the campfire.
zh: 佩奇和乔治在帮猪爸爸找木柴用来生火。

en: George, I'll pick up the stick sand you can carry them.
zh: 乔治，我来捡木柴，你来拿着。

en: That's a splendid campfire! Now I'll light it.
zh: 这个篝火堆得很好！现在我来点着它。

en: Daddy, how can you light it without matches?
zh: 爸爸，不要火柴你怎么生火？

en: I'm going to make fire the old way,
by simply rubbing these two sticks together!
zh: 通过简单的摩擦这二根木棍！

en: Daddy Pig is rubbing the two sticks together to light the campfire.
zh: 猪爸爸不断地摩擦二根木棍去点燃篝火！

en: Now we can heat up the tomato soup.
zh: 现在我们可以加热番茄汤了。

en: Ahhh! Listen to the sounds of nature!
zh: 啊~！来听听大自然的声音！

en: That is the sound of crickets chirping.
My tummy rumbling is one of the best sounds of nature!
zh: 我肚子的响声是大自然里最好听的一种声音！

en: It means it's time to eat!
There's another one of Daddy Pig's sounds of nature!
zh: 猪爸爸还有另外一个声音也属于大自然的！

en: Come on, children, into the tent,it's bedtime.
zh: 来吧，孩子们，进帐篷，该睡觉了。

en: Daddy, you're too big for the tent!
zh: 爸爸，你太胖了进不来的！

en: Never mind, I'd rather sleep outside anyway.
zh: 没关系，我其实宁愿睡在外边。

en: Mummy Pig, Peppa and George are sleeping in the tent.
zh: 猪妈妈，佩奇和乔治睡在帐篷里。

en: Daddy Pig is sleeping outside, under the stars.
zh: 猪爸爸睡在帐篷外的星空下。

en: Sleeping in the open air with the stars above me!
zh: 睡在空旷野外，上面是满天的星星！

en: Maybe this wasn't such a good idea after all...
zh: 也许这不是一个好主意。。。

en: Daddy! It was lovely and cozy in the tent!
zh: 爸爸！睡在帐篷里真的好舒服！

en: He must have been cold and wet.
